titles.title: Increasing Homeownership for Servicemembers Act
Increasing Homeownership for Servicemembers Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to seek to enter into an agreement with an entity to conduct a study and produce a report on barriers to home ownership for members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Increasing Homeownership for Servicemembers Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to seek to enter into an agreement with a federally funded research and development center or nonprofit entity to study and report on the barriers to home ownership for members of the Armed Forces.
